alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of southern Hamilton, west central Warren, northern Fulton and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Stratford to 8 miles southwest of Sacandaga Campground to near Edinburg. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...These storms are producing locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding especially of low lying and poor drainage areas are possible. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Edinburg, Northville, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Day Center, Sacandaga Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Harrisburg, Hope, Arietta, Benson, Oregon, Fairchilds Corners, Gilmantown, Girards Sugarbush, Tenantville, Sweets Crossing and Clockmill Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren
